content.user_title: Transcribe and Edit Chinese Speaking Videos
content.value_statement: Content creators struggle with manual video editing to remove speech errors, filler words, and awkward pauses. This skill automates video transcription and identifies all editable issues with precise timestamps for quick cleanup.
actual_capabilities: Transcribe video files using FunASR with character-level timestamps
Detect speech errors including repetitions, false starts, and incomplete sentences
Identify filler words and hesitation sounds in Chinese speech
Detect silence segments longer than 1 second with precise timing
Generate review documents with timestamp-driven deletion tasks
Process videos in 30-second segments to avoid timestamp drift
limitations: Requires FFmpeg and FunASR Python library to be installed locally
Optimized for Chinese language content only
Cannot automatically edit videos, only identifies issues for review
Requires manual confirmation before deletion tasks are executed

use_cases.title: Podcast Post-Production
use_cases.description: Podcast producers can process interview recordings to find all the ums, ahs, and false starts that need editing, saving hours of manual review time.

use_cases.title: YouTube Content Optimization

output_examples.input: Help me transcribe this video file and identify speech errors
output_examples.output: The skill will generate a transcript JSON file with character-level timestamps and a review document listing all detected issues including speech errors with precise start and end times, filler word locations with context, and silence segments longer than 1 second.

After processing, you will receive a detailed review document showing the full transcript with marked errors, a deletion task checklist organized by category (speech errors, filler words, silence), and all items marked with precise timestamps for easy editing.

best_practices: Always review the generated deletion task list before executing edits
Use 30-second segment processing for videos longer than 5 minutes
Check the review document context around filler words before deletion
anti_patterns: Do not skip reading the methodology files before processing videos
Avoid processing entire long videos without segmentation
Do not delete items without reviewing the surrounding context first

faq.question: What video formats are supported?
faq.answer: Any video format that FFmpeg can process, including MP4, MOV, AVI, and MKV files. The skill extracts audio for transcription.

faq.question: Does this skill work with English videos?
faq.answer: No, this skill is optimized specifically for Chinese language content. The speech error detection patterns and filler word lists are designed for Mandarin Chinese.

faq.question: Will this automatically edit my video?
faq.answer: No, this skill only identifies issues and generates a deletion task list. You must review and confirm the changes before executing any video edits.

faq.question: How accurate is the speech error detection?
faq.answer: The skill uses FunASR for transcription and applies rule-based detection for errors. Accuracy depends on audio quality and speaking clarity. Always review the generated list.

faq.question: What are the system requirements?
faq.answer: You need FFmpeg installed for audio extraction and the FunASR Python library with required models (approximately 2GB download on first use).

faq.question: Can I adjust the silence detection threshold?
faq.answer: Yes, the default threshold is 1 second, but you can request different sensitivity levels when processing videos.
